Nudity and offensive photos are not permitted. Policy violation will result in account termination.
Use your camera or choose images from your devices album, then tap upload. Photo should be a clear photo of yourself.
Remember to tap upload after you have selected your photo.
Your photo has been uploaded.
enter your friends user id and name
info
Please select a valid picture prior to upload.

Every user enters a unique user id whenever they install the app. Your user id is always shown in the top center area of the map. If you and a friend agree to follow one another, then you both enter each others name in the invite field, then you will be able to see each others location on your maps. Your location is represented by the moving blue dot on the map. Your friends location is marked with a red pin. To update your friends location you will need to occasionally tap the refresh link on your map. This refresh also provides your friend with your updated location. You can also tap on the red pins to see their name. The distance apart and time last updated is also displayed.
Note
continue
content must be a valid name, 3-20 characters (no spaces and no special characters)
content must be a valid name, 3-20 characters (no spaces and no special characters), multiple names must be seperated by a space
To tell your friends about this app, tap on either the email or text icons:

Hey I just installed the new app from iTunes "Find My Drunk Friends". My user id in the app is %d After you install it, text me your user id. Currently it only works on iPhone/iPad devices. Here is the iTunes link: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/find-my-drunk-friends/id972511208?ls=

Find My Drunk Friends allows you to see your location and your friends location interactively on a map. Simply ask your friend/s to also install the app, then exchange user id\'s with one another and you can then easily find one another.

To connect with a friend, enter their app user id followed by their name. Example: jsmith1 john smith
hoobee
get hoobee

The hoobee app is ideal for making new friends, dating, networking or just chatting with new and interesting people nearby. Its primary goal is to make it much easier to meet new people. An important distinction of hoobee from other social apps is that hoobee does not request email addresses, phone numbers, Facebook access, etc. Download the app and start making new friends or meet that special someone today!
what is hoobee?

to follow an unlimited number of friends you will need to select the upgrade link below and install the PLUS version of this app. This base version is limited to following only two friends.

currently not sharing

Tap the add icon to add a new friend. First you enter their user id that they created when they installed the app on their device. Follow their user id with one space and the name you best know them to be called. For example, if John Smith used a user id of jsmith1, you would enter: jsmith john smith. Once added, you can then control when they can see your location by tapping on the circle to the left of their entry. When a check mark appears in the circle they then can see your location. Remove the check mark and they will no longer be able to see your locaion. If and when your friend does the same for you on their device you will then be able to see their location.

Not able to add this friend to your database. You will need to upgrade to the plus version of the app. Tap the share link on the map page then the upgrade link. This version of the app only contains support for 2 friends, the plus version supports an unlimited number of friends in your database.

begin
This app needs to use location services on your device. Tap the begin link above until a popup appears for location services.

Your user id is registered and displayed above and to the right. You can use the share link to ask a friend to install the app on their phone. You can then follow your friend and/or your friend can follow you. You will use the friends link to maintain your friends within the app.
demo
real
while in demo mode you can not delete friends from your database
when checked your friend will be able to see your location on their map, when not checked your friend will NOT be able to see your location. while in demo mode you can not change this.
while in demo mode you can not add new friends to your database
tap refresh after adding new friends to your database
this app allows you to locate your friends and/or permits you to allow your friends to locate you. every user must have a unique user id, the app will request your user id at this time.
auto-on
auto-off
when auto-on is selected your map is updated automatically once every 5 minutes, when auto-off is selected your map is only updated whenever you tap the refresh link
when auto-on is selected your map is updated automatically once every minute, when auto-off is selected your map is only updated whenever you tap the refresh link

get upgrade
why upgrade?

The upgraded "plus" version of "Find my Drunk Friends" allows you to add an unlimited number of friends to your database. The non-plus version only allows for 2 friends in your database. Additionally, the "plus" version of the app will automatically update user locations every 2 minutes. The non-plus version automatically updates user locations every 10 minutes.
You are now in demo mode. When you are ready, change to real mode and invite some friends.
To add friends to your database you need to first select real mode on the map page.
The network is not responding, please try again with a better network signal.
The location of all users is updated automatically every 10 minutes in the standard app version. In the plus version of the app, user locations are updated every 2 minutes.
You have not yet added any friends to your database. Tap the share link to invite your friends, then tap the friends link to add your friends.
Drink Tally
Need to keep track of how many drinks you\'ve had? Tap beer glass to add 1, to reset the counter to zero, enter demo mode.
